ygData.msgSnippet: the leaves are a drop off of the young rock hoppers in the pit, looks like a clover ... From: stotty_k  To:
ygData.messageBody:
the leaves are a drop off of the young rock hoppers in the pit, looks like a
clover

----- Original Message -----
From: "stotty_k" <karen@...>
To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, January 22, 2002 2:36 AM
Subject: [EverQuest] stuck on luclin quest


> Hi hope that someone with SoL can help me out here.while having a
> stroll round Shar Val I hailed Merchant Ahlam, He gave me this
> quest.Merchant Ahlam says 'Ah good I was hoping you'd be along soon.I
> need you to collect some Gravel tea leaves from below the city. I
> need these leaves to make some tea for the guards under the arena. I
> need 10 of these leaves to brew enough tea for the guards. Take this
> pouch and fill it with leaves and return it to me.
>
> Now by under the city I assumed he means the newbie pit have looked
> all over and cannot find any leaves does anyone here know of this
> quest? and if so where should I be looking?
>
> Help please Purrgara
>
